1.content:
You awaking in the middle of a field. As you climb out of your stasis pod you begin to think,

Who am I?

Where am I?

Swindle, yes that is my name. I am a transformer

Looking at your right arm you noticed that you've been turned into an animal as your alternate
form.

Looking into a near by lake you see you are...
1.title: A new life

12.content:
you stare at the red spider that is your reflection as you examine each of your legs with your eight eyes.

With a thought you transform to your robot mode and begin to examine
it.

your eyes are represented by a visor while your mouth is hidden behind a metal plate. The front half of your body is formed by the head of your spider mode while the rest made up you back and legs. the spider legs stood out from your shoulders while pincers formed your hands.

Scanning the area around you, you see mountain
in the distance and a large wasteland the other way.

which way do you choose?
12.title: The spider bot

121.content:
Deciding you can get a better view from the top, you head towards the mountain.

you eventually reach the base of the mountain, you suddenly notices two gun turrets when a voice says "Turn around, slowly"

Doing so you see a rat based Transformer, pointing a gun at you, he then says, Follow me and keep your hands where I can see them"

Do you...
121.title: to the mountain

choices: Tell them you don't want to fight
1211.content: You fire three bolts of web at him pinning him to the floor! The turrets aim at you. You dodge the blast and transform into beast mode when you notice that you are surrounded by Maximals!
1211.title: Attack him

choices: An elevator starts to descend from the Axalon.
You hear someone approaching you from behind.
1212.content:
"Ah lead the way," you say nervously as the rat looks a bit surprised and takes you down a path, "so who are you?"

"I'm Rattrap," says Rattrap, "who are you?"

"I'm Swindle," you say as this makes Rattrap give you a stern look, "did I say something wrong?"

"Are you a Pred or a Maximal?" asks Rattrap as he keep his gun pointed at you.

"Ah not sure, I just woke up," you say as you hear rushing water and soon arrive at the Maximal base, the Axalon.


As you and Rattrap approach the Axalon......
1212.title: Do what he says

122.content:
You begin your trek towards the wastelands getting use to your new form. You scan the area without spotting any other bots, you vaguely wonder if you're the only Cybertronian on the world.

The thought makes you feel lonely, you imagine what your life would be like trapped on this dust ball.

You hear a rustling behind you.

"Move and you're scrap." A voice says from behind you warns. You look to see.
122.title: The wastelands

1221.content:
A gold and black she spider robot has a blaster pointing at your chest. You resist the urge to grab your own weapon knowing she would take you out before you could reach it.

"Well, I haven't seen you before." She looks you over with a bit of a smile. "At least you have good taste in a beast mode." She back serious again. "What is your programing, Maximal or Predicon?"

You have no answer to give her, you truly don't know. Your stasis pod had been damaged on entire into this world, your programing chip was fried. The she spider looks at you oddly.

"You don't even know your own programing!?" She guesses correctly after you don't answer, but the smile she had earlier returns to her. It isn't a very nice smile. "Something must have gone with your stasis pod. Poor boy you must be so confused." He lowers her weapon and puts on of her talons on you, she traces it along your chest lightly.

"Good thing I found you first, there are so many dangerous bots on this planet. I am Blackarachnia, and don't worry, I'll protect you." Blackarachnia assures.

A part of you wants to trust her, but another says she's bad news.

"I've got a friend with a lab not to far from here. He'd better take a look at your faulty programing. Come on!" Blackarachnia instructs you to follow her.
1221.title: Along came a spider

12211.content:
You follow her to a dank cave deep in a forest of sorts. Leading you into the cave she brings you to a big metal door. Rapping on the door a few times, she yelled,
"HEY!!! Tarantulas! It's me let me in! I've got a new one here for programing errors."
A loud crash was heard, along with a low grunt. The door slide open instantly, revieling another large spider-bot. He was mostly purple in color.


"Another one?! Well lets see what side your on... Come on!" He said as Blackarachnia nudged you in his direction.
He pushed you onto a table, surrounded by gadgets and gizmo's alike. Taking a plug of some sort, he plugged it into your head.
He hummed a little, then chuckled slightly...

"Interesting.....Acordding to this you Don't have a set program for us to find or restore. We need to show this to Megatron, he will be most pleased with this new 'Upset'." He finished with another chuckle.

Blackarachnia started to drag you away, towards a wasteland of sorts. Eventualy she gets tired of dragging you, and in your free time, start to fiddle with your Spider-legs. You notice that your red legs were actualy coivered in very tiny metal 'scales'. Interested you move one leg to your front and focus on the red scales. They all immediately opened, and a blue light glowed along the entire leg. Swinging it around it scratched a tree, slicing a gash in the side. Staring in awe at your weapon, you fiddle even more and find that you had amazing control of the scales,from opening the very tip, to the whole thing.

Wanting to find out more you start looking for new weapons, coming to you clawhand a simple thought and it turnes into a wierd looking gun with Electricity crackling inside. You aim around and think it's cool, when it fires on accident, a bolt of lightning zooming by Blackarachnia's head. After a pause she turned to you, angrier than a hornet in a fire...

"He-He...Touchy trigger." You mumble
.
The look on her face changed insantly to a smile,
"Haa!!! Yeah, I recomend you watch that from now on-" She turned around, an evil aura formed around her, "-Or you won't be firing it ever again!"

You faltered, triping on air. You continued your way to the Wastelands...
12211.title: a new Predacon

choices: You and Blackarachnia take them on yourselves
The other Predacons arrive to assist you-you meet with Megatron after the battle
122112.content:
All at once, several mammal-themed robots leap out at you and Blackarachnia, they've all got they're weapons aimed at you. A rhino, a rat, a cheetah, and a gorilla.

"Remember what I told you about that touchy trigger?" Blackarachnia ask

"Yeah."

"Forget I ever said it." she tells you as you and her get back-to-back and both fully activate your weapons-systems.

"Grate...another bug to squash." the cheetah said sarcasticly at the sight of you.

You glare at the (since you don't know your programing, your guessing) enemy robots. That was when a message flashed across your internal processor.

assassin program: activated.

All at once, just by looking at the robots around you, you can see THROUGH them all the way to they're cybertronian spark chambers!

Well...this'll definitely be useful! You made a mental note to tell this "Megatron" character you heard Tarantulas mention earlier about this. From what scattered bits of memory you have, the assassin program was only given to every one-in-ninety-billion bots.
122112.title: The Maximals ambush and...wait...you can WHAT?!

choices: You and Megatron have a talk later.......
You and Blackarachnia have a talk later.......
1221122.content:
You fire your gun, shooting the lightning at the ground to make a loud of dust. Using the cover of the dust, you move to a more managable spot to aid in your defense. Blackarachnia started to shoot at the Maximals, only to get a laser in the chest. You do the math in your head and it was plainly obvious that you were out numbered 2-7. Finding a clear path away was the best option for the two of you, but as you looked for one, you realize that they had you totaly surrounded.

"Megatron! Blackarachnia here, I'm surrounded and I need help or I'm scrap!" She yelled into the Com-Link in her arm.

A rather large blast shot out of the sky, and blasted the Maximals in front of you down.
"Predacon's Terrorize!" A rough, leader like voice ordered.

A swarm of Bots ran by you, ranging quite differently in the sixe department. The biggest of them, turned into this tank like thing and started shooting missles at them, while the littlest was flying around shooting explosive stingers at the enemy.

You and Blackarachnia joined the fight too, both going after the big Rino-bot. You shot a bolt of lightning at him, while Blackarachnia used her Spider-legs as a form of machine gun. The combination of the two attacks caused a rather big explosion, and the Rino was sent flying. The Maximals gathered around him, and the leader ape yelled,
"Maximals, Full retreat!"

You fired a few extra rounds of lightning at them as they fled. Every one was looking at you funny, well, exept Blackarachnia of course. This big bot, that resembled a T-rex like shape came walking over to you.

"Thanks for your help, you saved our butts from those losers." You say.

"Not a problem, you are family, right?" He asked with a smile, that creepy, you can't trust him as far as you could throw him kind of smile.
"Yeah!" You exclaim.

"Exellent! Another member of our family has joined us on our campain, now the Maximals will fall in no time at all!" He got everybody to cheer.

'Eh...Why not, it was kind of fun anyway....'
1221122.title: Family

choices: You get assigned a mission to assassinate the Maximal's leader by Megatron
You go to the medical/repair bay to see how Blackarachnia is doing
12211221.content:
"assassin program?" Megatron asked, sounding intrigued. "I've heard of that, before any of the cybertronian wars, it was proposed that the program be given to cybertronians to create a enforcer unit known as the "spark hunters" to allow there to prevent any uprising that would have lead to wars that could have destroyed all Cybertron. It allowed spark hunter units to see THROUGH all the way to the spark chambers of other cybertronians. Unfortunately, such a program was seen as too dangerous and the assassin program was reduced to use as a repair program due to its ability to see through technologic equipment and cybertronians alike, eventually its original purpose was forgotten along with the name "assassin program", I didn't know it still existed."

You groan at the thought, a combat program and if those Maximals found you first, you'd have been made to use it for the purpose of being a grease monkey.

Megatron nodded "Truely a waste of potential, I understand. Fortunately, times have changed."
12211221.title: explanation of the assassin program

choices: You continue........(Remember the Rules dangit!!!!! NO KILLING!!!!!!!)
122112211.content:
"Now according to what you explained earlier, you don't have any form of shell programming. This...is very good for our next mission. If you truely want to be a predacon, you must prove yourself first. Your mission is to infiltrate the enemy base, and eliminate their leader...Optimus Primal! Use any means neccesary to accomplish this task, then we will install some...apropriate programming." Megatron explained.

"Okay, no problem, but I'm going to need your strongest bots for this..."You start, and Megatron's smile grew.

**********************

The Predacons were chasing after you, firing shot after shot. Rampage was giving his old "Resistance is futile" monologue. Inferno was taking this as serious as any other fight for the "royalty".

Taking a few shots for dramatic affect, you fall and prepare for a fight for the death.
Suddenly a big bot dropped from the sky and blasted the Predacon's away. He turned to you with an outstretched hand.
'He realy is an idiot' You chuckle to yourself.

**********************

"But he was with the Pred's!" Eclaimed the cheeta like bot.
"Yes he was with the Pred's,...When they were about to turn him into scrap!" The big bot from earlier countered. He resembled a Ape.

"I bet they rejected him." A rat said snyly.
-----------------------------
Later that night you sneek around the base. Finding Optimus's room, you stand over his sleeping body. Leg-scales up and your laser-leg at his spark chamber, thanks to the Assasin Program this was a walk in the moonlight....
122112211.title: Mission #1

1221122111.content:
(sigh) I cant do it surlee I have more honor then this. you sand as you power down your wapons but accidentally fierd one but it misst balley but he did not wake up. that was clows (sigh) beast mode. you sand as you transford into your spider form a climd out the window.

The nxet morning Optimus jast wouk up and seor the barnt mark on his bad.

what happand here then. he sand as he exsamed the mark. it seems to be a laser blast but not anny or ours... wait Swindle but why I hath to find him.
1221122111.title: You can't!   (You turn Maximal.....Eeeeew!)

choices: you deliver Optimus's spark to Megatron
Dino-bot confronts you and aims to stop you from returning to the Predacons
1221122112.content:
You stand over Optimus, still aiming for his spark chamber. you can't do it. Not like this. Even as an assassin, this reeks of being beneath you. Besides, trust was like a house of cards: hard to build, yet all too easy to demolish. The other Maximals don't trust you, if they're leader was found with his spark destroyed after you were let into they're base, you'd be scrap in two seconds. Besides, the only real reason you were with the Predacons was that they said they could help you find answers about what side you were on. you spot a energy-contaminant thermos and nod. Killing a sleeping enemy might be too low for you but this wasn't. you pick up the thermos and then you plunge your claw into Optimus, ripping out his spark and placed in in the thermos. Now Megatron could either hold Optimus's spark hostage or even reprogram his spark's code, turning Optimus into a Predacon. you had a feeling that Megatron would like the idea of Optimus Primal serving under him.

Now to get back to the Predacon base.
1221122112.title: You continue........(Remember the Rules dangit!...

choices: Stasis- Lock commences befor you can get to the base...
12211221122.content:
"Predacon through and through, huh?" Snarled Dino-bot. Turning to face him, you draw your Laser-legs and prepare for an attack. Dino-bot looks at you, readying himself for the attack.
You quikly transform your claw into your gun, shooting a bolt of lightning at him. He dodged, and charged swinging at one of your Laser-legs. You heard a very loud CRACK as you look to find the leg that was hit had shattered.

Great! As it turns out your best weapon is as fragile as glass....Thats great to know... NOT THAT YOUR IN A LIFE OR DEATH SITUATION OR ANYTHING!!!!!!

He startes to swing for another, but you withdraw them to your back. You don't have much time, if you wait too long to get out of here you will be surounded by Maximals. I wasn't the quietest battle ever you know. Shooting another blast of lightning at him you try for the door Only to find that the bigger of the remaining Maximals was standing in the door.

"Out of the way, Rino boy!" You call as you shoot a blast of lightning at his spark chamber, knocking him straight onto Stasis-Lock. You look to find the other two Maximals comming down the hallway, guns drawn. A green double laser shot past your head, as two more smaller laser blast shot in front of you. Forgetting about thwe Maximals you focus mainly on your mission, pulling you options up.

You can try to fight them all off....HeHe, good luck doing that one......

You can flee by using the walls and ceiling in your Beast mode, but that would make you drop the Spark....
You suddenly were jolted from your thouyghts as all three of them got a shot at you simultaniously, sending the Stasis-Lock warning across your visual-screen. Cripled, you hold onto your damaged area's, thinking quickly, you only saw one way out of this mess.

"Damn-it!!!!!!" You yell, transforming into your spider form. You zoom up the wall, avoiding the blast of the Maximals, you slip right out of the base, and start your trek back to the Predacon base. A blast from the Maximal ship, reminded you of the dangers of lingering in their range. Thus, you scurried off faster than you ever thought a spider could move.

Although you could hear the Maximals laughing at you, as you tripped avery 4 or 5 steps.
Dude......You were missing a leg after all.....
12211221122.title: A for Effort

choices: Optumus sends you on a mission with Rattrap
12212.content:
"Who are you?"

"My name is Swindle." you reply

"Well Swindle...are you comming?" Blackarachnia asks, seems more like a demand.

"Thank you but I'll find my own answers, for all I know, I could be on the side your fighting, and I wouldn't want this friend of yous with a lab reprograming me."

Blackarachnia sighs

"Too bad."

You tumble-dodge a second later to avoid getting shot. Yep, she was bad news. Your programing chip was fried, but anybody that shot at you wasn't a friend, programing would have told you otherwise, but logic told you one thing: turn her to scrap! You grab your own weapon and shoot back at her. Soon you two are engaged in a red-hot fire-fight. You talk cover and shoot, knocking her weapon away, the next second, a shot hits her from behind and some animal-themed robots walk twords you. They all have they're blasters out. Not good! You shoot a few shots at the leader, a gorilla-themed bot, you soo regret it, as his companions open fire at you, you hide behind a rock.

"Hold your fire!" the leader orders, the others lower they're weapons

"Come out." he said to you.

"Throw your weapons aside and I will!" you answer

"Only if you do the same."

"Deal." You don't know why, but part of you feel you can trust this group's leader.
You walk out and toss your blaster tword the gorlla-robot, he and his troops do the same.

"Who are you?" the leader asked

"Swindle, I don't know what side I'm on. My stasis pod was been damaged on entiry, and my programing chip was fried." you said, holding your hand up.

"That is a problem. Swindle, I am Optumus Prime. If I swear by the matrix to have your programing restored as it was before your pod was damaged, would you accept?"

"Agreed. And should I be on the other side, I apoligize in advance." you said as you walked forward and picked up your blaster and handed it to Optumus as a gesture of good-fath.


"Come with us then."

a while later, your programing chip was good as new, Optumus kept his word, you know your a Maximal. You only hav a spider's shape.
12212.title: Meeting the Maximals

choices: He began to fire at you
He demands you to identify yourself
You are saved by a Maximal patrolling the area
151.content:
“A sssnake huh?” you say, noticing that you speak with a hiss to your voice, drawing out the length of your Ss,

“Well that’sss going to get annoying pretty fast.”

Continuing to exclaiming your reflection, you noticed that your scales are dark green with a trail of black strips running down your back.

“Enough of looking at my reflection, I ssshould probably try and find out where I am and who I am.” Looking round, you decide to pick a random direction and began to sliver off, hoping to find something or someone that could shade a bit more light on who you are, other then what your you name is and that your from Cybertron.

After what seemed liked hours, you soon reached a barren plane. Before you could decide what to do next you hear the sound of someone approaching. Eyes sweeping the area, you soon spot the approaching figure, a giant red ant emerging from behind a large rock formation; unfortunately he spotted you as well.

“An intruder!” the ant yelled, “You dare invade colony territory. Inferno Terrorize!”

As the ant transformed to it robot form, you slowly back away. Your memory might be scrambled beyond belief, you remember enough to know that was the Predacon transformation code word the bot had used and Predacons had a tendency to shoot first ask questions later if ever.

At this point the ant bot drew a large dangerous looking gun from subspace and aimed it at you.
151.title: Snake-former

choices: Continue crushing the Predacon using your beast-mode
Risk letting go to transform so you could use you weapons
A Maximal arrives and covers for you so you can transform
1511.content:
The Predacon, as you guessed, started shooting at you. Fourtanatly you were expecting that so you slitter out of the way. Good thing this Boa constrictor had such a streamline body. You quickly dodge blasts and wrap your body around the homicidal bot and start to crush him. He struggled and cried out as you exert more pressure on his internal systems. The thing about Predacons was THEY didn't like being destroyed, but they LOVED to destroy everyone and everything else around them. Hypocrites.

You now had two ways of dealing with this Predacon: play it safe and continue to crush him using your beast-mode OR you could try the risky choice of transforming so you could use your weapons.

You didn't know how close any Maximals were, and you would have to let go of this guy to transform. But if he has backup, you were going to need a weapon.

What do you do?
1511.title: decisions...decisions...

choices: Dinobot (his the coolest one deal with it
1513.title: You are saved by a Maximal patrolling the area

1551.content:
you walk over to see your reflection in the lake you see yourself as black dragon with red strips and blue eyes, "What is this, where am I?" . your hear a explosion near by.

"What was that?". as you take to sky to see what was happening, you encounter
1551.title: Dragon

15511.content:
you saw two transformers fighting you can here what they are saying.

"You think you got the drop on me didn't you old friend? Rampage Terrorize!" Shoutedthe crab as he turned into a robot and pulled his gun out.

"you won't get away this time X." said the blue robot as he shot the other one's gun out of his hand then it turned back into a crab again,but this time it had a gun and tank treads. you decided to help one but who ?
15511.title: Rampage battling Death Charge

155112.content:
You fly out into the air and release a ball of fire striking the crab robot and sending flying into the wall.
"who are you?"asked the blue robot."I am-"you are cut of by a wicked laugh."Yess it seems that there there is a new one on this planet.!"said a voice behind you. You know that voice, it's Megatron!
155112.title: Death Charge

choices: You wake up in a CR chamber,....whatever that is?
You wake up in a room with a one of the robots from before.
15521.content:
"Strange?.....Apparently I'm a wolf.....But why? And were am I?" You asked yourself. You had no Idea how you got here, or anything else, exept your name...Swindle.
Noticing that the sun was setting, you lay down next to the lake and watched it go down. Amazed at the beauty of it, you had never seen anything like it before...you think. Laying your head down, you realise that some white thing had started to rise in the opposite dirrection. It was magnificent, it looked almost silvery in color. Watching it for what seemed like hours on end, your ear twitched as you heard a sound coming from behind you. You crawl towards the tall grass beside you, as you focus on some creature walking towards the lake.

It looked...wierd, you couldn't even describe it. Some metal like skin and it walked on two legs. You crouch down lower too avoid detection, and continued to watch the creature. A beeping came from its arm, and it looked from a screen on it's arm to you. Immediatly pulling out a weapon of some sort.
"Come out now or beware the consequenses!" It yelled
It's voice was male and he looked more friendly than enemy. Seeing as you note the difference from having a weapon to not having one you step out into the open. He lowered his weapon and spoke calmly,
"Welcome friend, I see that you are new to this planet and could probably use some help getting used to everything."

Not having any knowledge of how to talk, you try to say a word that had already said,
"...F...Friend?" You stutter.
"Yes! So your a Maximal too, right?"
"Everything....New"
"What are you talking about?"
Alright, he wasn't going to get this any time soon. You try a new tactic,
"Help..." You mutter, getting better at the whole talking thing. You walk over to the thing you came out of, in hopes that it would help him understand.
He looked at your Stasis-Pod and realised your prediciment.
"Oh! How nieve of me! You were damaged by the crash, please forgive my idiocy and follow me." He asked offering a hand.

Just then an explosion erupted from the ground and you dodge over to the right.
"Aww...Lookes like we were too late, Wasspinator thinks that we should kill them now and tell megatron later." A flying one said. The other two shot lasers at you and your friend. You dodge left and right, avoiding the shots. While your friend got blasted in the chest and fell to the ground, twitching as sparks ran along his body.

You dodge more and more and charge the attackers, clamping down with your jaws on his shoulder and ripped a chunk off. You jump off and go for the flying one. Ripping a wing off, you watch as he flew randomly into trhe horrizon. A blast nailed you in the side and sent you flying. Feeling the pain fly through you body, slowly get back up and noticed that all the enemy's were gone. You walk over to you friend and plop him onto you back.

"Thank...you, the....base is that...way."He said through gritted teeth. You start to limp towards the direction, and after a grueling 4 hours you both make it to the base. A gun homed in on you, but quikly dropped as the woman looking figure came running out followed by like 5 more of them.
"Silverbolt!" She yelled.
You collapse to the ground as a warning flashed in front of your eyes.

..........Stasis-Lock..........
15521.title: Potential Maximal

155212.content:
Your eyes flicker open, and you winced in pain. Apparently, you don't heal as quickly as you would like. You tun to see someone sitting beside you, It was that one from earlier.
"It was a good thing we found you, we were about to set off for home when we got your pod signal. What's your name?" He asked.

"Swindle, And I don't remember much..." Realising that you know how to speak now, you wonder why.

"Yes, We know, in you Stasis-pod crash your memory mainframe was completly eradicated. We put a new one in, but...The same goes for your Transformation-Module, It'll repair itself, but it will take time." He said.

* One minute to Launch *

"Lets get strapped in, Were going home!"


(YEAH I went straight to Beast-Machines)
155212.title: Home

choices: Your able to Transform, and you Blue!
Your able to Transform, and your Jet-Black....
1552121.content:
Running........It's all you've done since you woke up.
As of this moment thats what you were doing. You were running from these things on round things. They kept up with your speed pretty easily, and they often shot at you.

Losing them in a series of allyways again, you rest as you feel sparks jump across your body. Pain had continualy shot through your body since you woke up. You've gotten used to it, although it leaves you easily weakened and tired.
Panting heavily, you crawl under a pile of junk into a hole you've dug up slowly. Actually, it's more of a cavern, now at least 20 feet under the surface. You had started to dig, because something told you that digging north would prove usefull in someway...So you dug, and now your left with a 20 foot deep cavern, that goes on for about a mile........What a life......

Regaining you usual amount of strength, you work your way to your newest hole, and begin digging again.
A couple minutes later, your ears pick up a sound from deeper under you hole. In a frenzy you franticly dig, with hopes of escaping this place. You dug so quickly, that you soon fell down, through your 'floor'.

Landing in a rather big room/garden, you get up shakily. A Rat, a Cheeta, a Spider and an Ape came out of nowhere, and helped you up. They looked wierd, to say the least. They looked like a mix of machinery, and animals. To shaken up to understand a word they were saying to you, you collapsed from exaughstion.

Strangly you heard the words of one sentence,....

"I know it's risky, but if I don't do it, he could die from the virus...."

'Virus?' You ask youself.

A stange light enveloped you, and....
1552121.title: The Problem With This Place.......

choices: Complain right now and right here!
15521212.content:
You slept.... Soundly, not a stir. Not a care in the world...
You havn't felt so free in a long time! You felt as if you could do more than anything...More like everything!

You awoke with a jump, as you flew off the bed you were on. You had no idea where you were, but you needed to know. Walking slowly around the room you realised that you didn't hurt anymore. It felt so good that you could jump onto the roof and dance. You were so happy that you didn't notice the mirror-fragment in front of you.

Jumping at the sight of movement, you growled at it, for it was strange that it did not make noise like most animals do. You creep closer to the similarly moving creature, and began to sniff the air. Looking for any signs of a scent other than your own...But that's when you noticed the difference.

Your scent had changed! It was more metalic that it was before. You glanced back to the 'creature' only to bump your snout into the mirror fragment. Pawing at it, you thought it was a trick. The thing pawing back at you didn't look like you at all! So it must be a very bad lookalike, and to prove that you backed away from it, and charged. Upon contact with the creature, it shattered, causing you to tumble backwards in shock.

Looking at the peices of the mirror, you still wonder what that creature was, until you looked down and realised that the creature was all around you! In little bitty peices, You soon realized that theat thing in the mirror was your reflection!

Gazing at it, you wonder at you new visage... A wolf body but with some, 'Modifications'. You looked like a black wolf, but your body looked half machine and half wolf....How?

As you perplexed your new room, your new look, and the fact that you had no idea were you were, A door behind you opened up.

A Spider walked partialy inside the door, and said,

"Time to train,...Mut!"

You growled at the term she used. You didn't know what it meant, but something inside of you told you that it was rude...
15521212.title: The Monster in the Mirror

choices: Train, and figure this Transformation thing out for yourself..
A random fight occurs, forcing your Transformation...
155212121.content:
You follow the spider to a room that looked familiar to your old cavern, only bigger, and full of wierd looking tree's. You hadn't said a word since you woke up. The spider turned to you with an annoyed look on her face.

"You need to learn how to transform all over again, because now that were Transformed, its much harder to do it now" She said almost as if she was reading off a piece of paper.

"Hey! Blackarachnia! Give the kid a break!" A rat screamed from inside a pile of machinary.
You jumped back a bit, since you were used to people coming after you.

"Dont worry friend, you are safe here with us. We are here to help you." An Ape came out and told you.
You nod in agreement.
"We need your help to fight and live in this world. Our mission is to regrow plants and spread plantlife all over Cybertron." The Ape continued.
"Can you speak?" He asked after looking over your form.
You tilt your head to the side in confusion, and realized that youy havent even tried to since you woke up. You opened your mouth to answer..
"Yes.." A low, Barely audible wisper was heard. Apparently you could speek, but it would take a while for you to be able to speak full sentences.

"Good, now in order to Transform, you need to say the key words, 'I am Transformed!' But, that is not all. It requires a decent amount of concentration and focus to achieve this transformation."
The Rat said A-Matter-Of-Factly.

"This is Ratrap, Blackarachnia, And I'm Optimus.. We have another member, he is a Bat, so dont go attacking him.. He is new too." Optimus anounced.
"S-...Swindle..." You whispered your name.
"Swindle? Oh, that must be your name! Welcome Swindle, Your now one of us!" Optimus Bellowed with a smile.
155212121.title: Introdutions and the innability to talk...Still

1552121212.content: Suddenly a flying ant burst thought the ceiling. It transformers into an extremely dark red botwith strips of black(this is how I imagine beast machine inferno)"Hail lord Megatron"he yelled as he fired bolts all over the place. As more robots entered and attacked your friends. You decided the only course of action was to help but Optimus told you to run. But you are not fast enough you get frustrated and suddenly turns into a wolf! You ran towards the exit and look back.
1552121212.title: A random fight occurs, forcing your Transformation

15522.content: How about a robo-Killer Bee?
15522.title: Never!!!!!

155222.title: Take a bite out of this!

1552221.content: You are a shark then you remembered your name Skybyte but your mind is still foggy on with side you are on.
1552221.title: SHOW ME THE  JAWS

15522222.content: How about a two headed dragon?
15522222.title: More choices please.

choices: Both heads of the beast is male.
155222221.content: The other head have a mind of its own obviously. The other head was another transformer, Swindle might not even know who the other transformer is. It could be that the other head is entirely the opposite of Him. Swindle was about to transform into an incomplete beast mode,but he felt a powerful force pull him nearly at the speed of light towards another transformer that was being pulled by the same force towards him. Before Swindle had a chance to identify the other bot, they collided into each other. They were both knocked out due to the impact, but their bodies began merging to form a complete beast mode.
155222221.title: Two heads are awesome

1552222212.content:
The collision took place in front of the lake. Swindle slowly opened his eyes and saw his reflection in the mirror. He was stunned at his reflection. His entire body was now covered by some kind of metal skin. He saw that his new form was a purple dragon with black stripes on. To make things worse Swindle's head was not alone, there was another head on the side of his. The head had its own long neck that was attached to the same body. The head was still unconscious. It looked similar to Swindle's but a female version.
Her green eyes slowly open, she was just as shocked as Swindle. She quickly pulled back causing them to almost fall over. There was a power struggle as both tried to pull apart, it lasted a few minutes but they came to the conclusion that they had equal control over their body. The female head quickly regained composure and said " This is an interesting predicament, my name is Nighbird." . Swindle could sense and evil presence within her. " I am Swindle. " , he responded. " Let's transform and see what happens. ", Nightbird said licking her lips. Swindle agreed.
They both had to admit that transforming felt a lot different now. In the place of the dragon stood a two headed humanoid. Each of their heads now had its own visible characteristics . To Swindles surprise there body was mostly female, it had a muscular physique. The body had purple skin and black markings, it even had built in heels in the feet. " Not what you expected..." , Nightbird said. " I didn't it would be so feminine, it just feels weird. " , Swindle said. " Get used to it, cause we are stuck this way. I am just glad that I am familiar with this physique, but it have a manly feeling to it but I wouldn't mind having an antenna. " , She said licking her lips. It took them a few minutes but they managed to stretch the wings out on their back and took flight. While flying they saw a group of transformers , but who were they?
1552222212.title: Let's add a twist.

155222222.content: Ok...for the sake of keeping this from being endless, let's go by the TYPE of beast mode. Up for a reptile?
155222222.title: More forms

choices: No, too many big cats already. Next choice
1552222222.content: How about a Smilodon, (a type of saber-toothed cat) as the Beast Mode?
1552222222.title: A Smilodon?

info.brief_description: You are a new warroir in the Beast Wars.
info.description:
Your a new warrior in the Beast Wars. You must chose the which side you are on, The Maxinmals or the Predacons. Loyal solider or traitorous schemer. the choises you make may let you live or die.

No Sex or Gay/Lasbien stuff.

No killing any of the characters

The charater has already awoken from he stasis pod and gotten his name, so no posting chapters of the charater coing out of it's stasis pod
